Definition.WordDefinition: hard core n : the most dedicated and intensely loyal nucleus of a group or movement

hard-core adj 1: stubbornly resistant to change or improvement; "hard-core addicts" [syn: {hardcore}] 2: intensely loyal; "his hard-core supporters" [syn: {hardcore}] 3: extremely explicit; "hard-core pornography" [syn: {hardcore}]

hardcore adj 1: stubbornly resistant to change or improvement; "hard-core addicts" [syn: {hard-core}] 2: intensely loyal; "his hard-core supporters" [syn: {hard-core}] 3: extremely explicit; "hard-core pornography" [syn: {hard-core}]
